QualityParameterInfo¶

class quality_assessment.data_types.QualityParameterInfo(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Protocol for defect information

p_id (int): ID of the defect start_position (float): Start position of the defect. end_position (float): End position of the defect. center_position (float): Center position of the defect. width (float): Width of the defect section. value (float): Value of the defect. description (str): Description of the defect information
